Machine_PlayerDamageDurability_Descripti: Should player attacks damage machine's durability? [Default: true]
Machine_EngineRunningSounds_Description: Should machine engine sounds play while running? [Default: true]
Machine_LockedBackSeat_NonOwnerMountable: Should non-owner players be able to sit in the back seat of locked machines? [Default: true]
Machine_NoPlayerDrivingTurnOff_Descripti: Amount of time it takes for empty machines to turn off in seconds? [Default: 30, Min:1]
Fuel_ChargeTime_MachinePelletsPerTickTim: Amount of time between recharge ticks for machine pellets in seconds. [Default: 30, Min:1]
Fuel_ChargeTime_MachinePelletsPerTickAmo: Amount of charge applied per recharge tick for the machine charger. [Default: 30, Min:1]
Fuel_ChargeTime_MachineChargerTimePerTic: Max amount of time between recharge ticks for the machine charger in seconds. Affected by mechanical power %. (int)[Default: 30, Min: 1]
Fuel_ChargeTime_MachineChargerPerTickAmo: Max amount of charge applied per recharge tick for the machine charger. (int)[Default: 15, Min: 1]
